website_summaries.verdict: Practical light for many areas, but it has some flaws. Other options offer a better value.
pros: Small design fits most areas and emits bright light
Solar powered and simple to install
cons: Sometimes the sensor is slow to react
Poor customer service and frustrating return policy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light even better price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome solar light! I was impressed with how bright the light was compared to my neighbors lights. Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: These things are the best so bright! I mean soooooooo bright!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What great lights! These lights are really bright. Surpasses my expectations. Quality night lights. The sensor is triggered by smaller animals like the cats. Glad we bought them!
customer_reviews.author: RV Medic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this light if you don't want the hassle of having to set up a wired light. We had a deck extension and with the location had no light from out existing lights. We have it set on the motion setting as soon as we open our back door the light turns on. Great light
customer_reviews.author: andrew crowell

customer_reviews.title: These lights are great, i did not expect much
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great, i did not expect much, but they turned out to light the path much better than expected and everybody loves them.
customer_reviews.author: tim weir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, just be sure you install where it can get sunlight to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Solid product if you can't hardwire a light fixture, but needs DIRECT sunlight
customer_reviews.text: Installed it on the trim of my house near the garage. Unfortunately this product needs DIRECT sunlight, so if your roof has a lip or overhang, you will need to accommodate for that. They recommend installing it between 5.5ft - 6.5ft, but mine is installed much higher, closer to 10ft and works fine. I would prefer to leave it on setting 1, which makes it stay on full brightness until the battery is depleted but I heard even on a full charge it will go out within 5 hours or so. So I leave it on setting #2, which is dim mode and full brightness upon detecting motion at night.
customer_reviews.author: hungrymanTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: So far so good just ordered the larger one
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far I wish it could stay on bright bright all night but I guess that would just run the battery down
customer_reviews.author: Joey Redditt

customer_reviews.title: NEW SOLAR LIGHTING
customer_reviews.text: After buying these solar lights i had a few quesion that were all answered by Megan. I must admit the solar lights are bright and light up my back yard very well. I wish you could adjust the time on how long the lights stay on after motion sets them off but all in all, very good solar lights and i've bought alot of different one and these are the best and brightest by far..
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away - They Don't Last - SEE UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After this review was posted the company contacted me and told me this was not normal for their product. They asked me for the S/N off of the lot, so they could check their manufacturing records. But I had already thrown the lights away. Without my saying anything or asking, 4 new lights showed up in the mail. At least they have excellent Customer Service!! Will have to see how these replacements hold up. Stay away from these. Bought them, loved them, thought they were great. Then within about 4 months, all stopped working. Not all at once, one would fail, then another, then another. In around 4 months, all were not working any more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great little solar light - very light weight with a ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great little solar light - very light weight with a powerful light! Anyone owing a business that needs outside lighting at night should really look into this little gem. mike After 2 months - would not work - save your money - do not buy this light.
customer_reviews.author: mpf

customer_reviews.title: Turns off Too Quick!
customer_reviews.text: Lights stay on for only 20 seconds! No where on the website did it state that it would only stay on for such a short amount of time. I purchased 8 of these lights based on what other reviewers had said, that theirs stayed on for up to 60 seconds or longer. But mine only stays on for 20 seconds or even shorter. Although lights are very bright, they do not stay on long enough for my purpose. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: T. V.

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for a few days and then completely stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few days and then completely stopped working. It gets direct afternoon sunlight with zero obstruction so I know it's not that the battery isn't getting charged. Wish it worked better because I like the idea but it doesn't seem like a trustworthy product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Photos And Description Are Deceiving - Lights Do Not Work As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The description reads: "24 LEDs, Super Bright Motion Sensor Lights with Wide Angle Illumination, Wireless Waterproof Security Lights", but "super bright" is a huge stretch. I would describe them as "barely bright". The lights are also much smaller than I expected. The motion sensor triggered just fine when I went outside after dark, but the light barely lit the steps over which I mounted it. There was little dispersion left of right and the amount of light in any direction was not indicative of the advertisements photos. Very misleading. CombatCritic Gives Litom SOLAR LIGHTS OUTDOOR 24 LEDs, Super Bright Motion Sensor Lights 3 Bombs Out Of 10 ... More Bombs Are Better!
customer_reviews.author: CombatCritic

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Great Value! Weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I have a very dark front yard and wanted something to give it some light. These fit the bill. I ordered 4 of them and they have been working flawlessly for the past 4 months. I have them set so its dim and turns bright only when it detects motion. The picture is of them being on the dim setting. When activated, they definitely give off plenty of light to see the yard clearly. Edit: So this is the first winter with these and I was wondering how weatherproof they are. Just check out the frozen pics with icicles and they still work even the motion sensor!
customer_reviews.author: Renitintin

customer_reviews.title: And light for all
customer_reviews.text: This fixture works great. It is very compact yet provides an excellent light pattern that is a full 180 degrees. I mounted the fixture 13 feet high on the corner of a shop building. It is set to come on with motion and lights the area with bright enough light to see details in our security camera system. I will be purchasing 4 more to place around the buildings at our fishing lake.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. C.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small, not even close to the newer version
customer_reviews.text: I'm not even sure why they still sell this model. It's way too small and a poor comparison to the newer version. Much to my dismay they also don't let you return it due to "special packaging" I call bull crap it's because they are trying to get rid of the old model and know you'll just try to send it back after you get it because of its poor performance....Truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zriggio

customer_reviews.title: My wife said they were TOO bright
customer_reviews.text: She's short, so she complained that they blinded her when I had them mounted on the front fence where an earlier light had lived. I moved them to a place of MY choosing, and think they work great. We've had several days with hardly any sun, but they stayed on low all night, and went to high power when a coon walked by. My only real complaint is that I wish the frame was a little bigger on top where the screw goes in. I'm only using one attachment point (because it's a pain to use the bottom one), and it feels a little flimsy. In the best of all worlds, BOTH screw holes would be accessible from the front.
customer_reviews.author: ksteinhoff

customer_reviews.title: Only work normally for 2 days!
customer_reviews.text: Stop working on the fourth day! It worked really well on the first two days. The third day the light started getting weak. And no light on the fourth day even after a very sunny day. I have already thrown the wrapping box so that's it. Crappy product!
customer_reviews.author: Zeren Gao

customer_reviews.title: ONE Star for the product, FOUR STARS for the excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I like still like this product, but it still doesn't work well in cold weather, new lights sent to me same issues.
customer_reviews.author: chefx42

customer_reviews.title: Problems with every set I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first set I purchased because one of the lights only worked for a very short time. I just received the replacement, and I'm hoping this set fully works. Other than that one issue, I am happy with the amount of light it gives out. UPDATE: I received three different sets, and with each set at least one light didn't even work. Some of the others, didn't last long at all. For the amount of money these lights cost, they should work perfect and for years. I do not recommend these. I will go back to getting the cheaper ones, they actually work a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. One gets a lot of sun, the other is under the porch roof and only gets daylight. The range in width and distance is really good. I keep mine on the medium setting, dim light until activated by motion, and they have enough charge for several hours after dark, even in the winter. The light is bright enough to light my otherwise dark walk way without any issues. I experimented with a few locations before permanently mounting them so placement might influence performance. I am also buying a few more for my friends who like them too.
customer_reviews.author: A. LOPILATO

customer_reviews.title: A few down falls but works...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described but I do have complaints. The light doesn't stay on long enough. I use this to let my dog out at night and be able to see him as we don't have a fenced in yard currently. The motion sensor can be a little difficult to set off. My main complaint is that you can't adjust the time as to how long the light stays on. It's somewhere around 15-20 seconds. It should be at least 1 minute by default. I wouldn't buy it again as there are other options that work better.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bright light!
customer_reviews.text: Can not complain , I set these up on the side of the house so I can have some light when grabbing the trash cans at night. Very bright and the motion sensor are great!
customer_reviews.author: john z

customer_reviews.title: All screws on the back of the item rust out ...
customer_reviews.text: All screws on the back of the item rust out causing stains. Manufacturer should use stainless steel screws I bought 5 or 6 of these. Half of them stopped working less than a year later.
customer_reviews.author: gregory brock

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: After I posted the review below the company contacted me and sent me the newest model. MUCH BETTER. Charges well. Displays well. We use it everyday. —- I had high hopes for this product. When it works it’s really bright. I fully charged it for two days in bright Ca sunlight. When I put it in the motion mode it may activate but only stay lite for 10 seconds even when there is constant motion. It works sporadically in the “on” mode. What’s worse is I wanted to return it but according to Amazon when you try to return it says this product can not be returned. I guess I look for another product from s different company.
customer_reviews.author: steve schwaid

customer_reviews.title: I’ll update later.
customer_reviews.text: Update: made contact with the vendor, they’re checking the mfg status of the unit which means they may of had an issue. Due their quick response and willingness to address and resolve the issue I’m upgrading the star status to 5. Nothing is perfect all the time but resolving issue quickly and fairly gets my best rating. First day it was great but after that even in direct sunlight it’s not bright and usually dies within 3-4 hrs. Not sure if it’s defective or just how it’s built.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Def buy this:)
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light. It charged in 2 hours and gives a lot of light. I have it in dim and it's nice to walk my dogs and bright when I'm under it .
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: These babies are great
customer_reviews.text: Installation was one screw, took about 30 seconds. Also could have done it with double stick tape or Velcro. Set up in the mode to turn on bright when motion detected. They will not detect motion or turn on during the day, but at night they work perfectly. I have them around my back yard and they turn on when one of my dogs walks by the front field of view. They are amazingly bright lighting up a large portion of my yard. Great for security or convenience. They stay on for about 20 seconds. I wish this was adjustable but I can live with it. Thinking about more places to install as I type this....
customer_reviews.author: D. Mihelcic

customer_reviews.title: POOR MOTION DETECTION ***SEE UPDATE AT THE END***
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. this does not come on unless a large adult walks directly under it. NONE of my dogs set it off and I have boxers. pretty much useless motion detector. I would NOT buy this again ***UPDATE*** While I still do not recommend this particular light as it is not bright or sensitive enough for dogs or even people at a distance, I DO recommend this company!! They read my complaint and immediately responded by refunding my money and sending me a larger replacement light which is GREAT! It's the 52 light version of this light. A lot brighter and more sensitive! I would definitely recommend the larger one!
customer_reviews.author: ribbett2012

customer_reviews.title: The motion sensing device is faulty. I purchased the ...
customer_reviews.text: The motion sensing device is faulty. I purchased the two pack- one was DOA. I got that exchanged. Now, 6 months later, the replacement hardly senses motion. I can stand in front of it and jump around in the dark and it does not go on unless I touch the unit. The motion sensing seems to be effective only at a few inches from the unit. I've been trying to track down the warranty info but it's not readily available. Work in progress...
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as depicted in description
customer_reviews.text: 1. these are really mini lights. All 4 add up to about one standard outside barn light output but light is diffuse and they don't project very far 2. Be very careful how tight you tighten the mounting screw. The brittle plastic will crack and not hold the light if you go too far. And the mounting materials are really cheap. 3. I worry what will happen with repeated freeze-thaw cycles given brittleness of plastic. That said, they would make nice lights for a pergola or a fence. Just not up to the robustness needed for a barn (lights need to be 15-25 feet off ground and need powerful projection of light).
customer_reviews.author: ChoJo

customer_reviews.title: GreatLittle Light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very bright. Small size does not clutter up the wall where mounted. The "on" setting offers 3 choices: dim constant on; dim on with motion detected high intensity alert, and off with high intensity motion sensing alert. I love this light!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bright and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about using only one light being used to light up a 10X10 deck floor. The area is in partial sunlight for part of the day. This one light, at knee height, has no problem lighting the deck floor for several hours into the night. I know for sure its at least 5 hours but do not stay up late enough to know how long it lasts- at least until midnight. It does not just provide a light source like a glow stick- it sheds light across the deck illuminating the whole deck area.
customer_reviews.author: joellen

customer_reviews.title: wont not recommend this product to anyone never work tired of wasting my money on these solar crap
customer_reviews.text: it does not work, since i got it i left in sun in florida for 3days to 5days never light turn light switch on no lights nothing nada waste of product and money
customer_reviews.author: jenbri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect inside my horse trailer
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bright light. I bought it for my horse trailer to light up my "living area" when I enter after dark. It's been perfect especially when my hands are full and I don't have turn on a light. It stays on the whole time I'm inside and turns off soon after I leave. Also great early in the morning while camping and I come down from sleeping area I don't have to fumble for switch in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn C.

customer_reviews.title: Good lights but major flaw in water proofing.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these were awesome, a few lighting "options" to choose from, good brightness, and claiming to be ip65 rated. If you disassemble these lights they have really well designed gaskets, except for one critical flaw. The switch on the back is pretty much wide open with no seal, so water can slowly seep in through here. I've had these in use for about two years and two of four are dead as a result. To be fair this is in WA where it rains a lot, but I think the switch should have a flap or cover over it. Alternatively having a weep hole at the bottom could drain any water that found its way in.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mark Knisley

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made and works well!
customer_reviews.text: There is a dark area on the side of my garage where I keep the garbage pails. I had always worried about encountering a raccoon, skunk (or bear) while taking out the garbage. The specs on this like looked ideal for my needs and, indeed, does seem to meet my needs very well. There is easy one screw mounting - I did replace the steel screw with a stainless steel one, the motion detection works well and the light is very bright; especially for the very few times I need it to operate. I've had it about a week and, so far, am pleased. We'll how well the batteries and solar cells work as the product ages.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Saccullo

customer_reviews.title: Litom brand solar LED lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights work very well. Be sure to verify that they will get at least a couple hours of direct sunlight every day. I bought two of these about a year ago and they have worked well every night. I have them set to just stay on dim rather than go completely off. On the dim setting they still provide enough light to let you see as you approach. When they detect motion they really light things up! They only stay on for about 20 seconds unless you are still moving within the range of the motion sensor. You can't beat 'em for the price (~$10-$12 each when on sale)
customer_reviews.author: marksports

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as expected, motion sensitivity randomly functions properly (Oct 2017 UPDATE with better rating)
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly bright on its brightest setting for above my garage door. I expected brighter given the type of LEDs and the number of them. Sometimes the motion detection doesn't trigger the light to get brighter, even if you walk right up under it. Pretty random. It's better than nothing, I guess. Oct 10, 2017 UPDATE: This update is kind of overdue, but not long after I wrote this review with a 3-star rating due to my dissatisfaction with the product... without a word, the seller made things right. I'm happy with the product it was replaced with, and the service. Upgraded to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Light was mediocre, seller sent free upgraded model, happy now!
customer_reviews.text: Installed as an RV porch light...worked mediocre at best...switch was on back, so when installed it was inaccessible....Seller listened to my frustrations, and without being asked, shipped me an upgraded model with more led diodes, and an improved set of functions..also the switch is on the front! Very happy about this company caring about my satisfaction and being proactive about ensuring customer satisfaction! The product gets 3 stars, but the total for my review is 5 because I did end up with what I set out to purchase...a nice porch light for my RV..and also because the customer service was outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Harper

customer_reviews.title: Three great lights, one that died a week into it...
customer_reviews.text: I would gladly give this five stars, but one of the lights stopped working less than a week after we installed them. There is no way to order a new battery (can't find them anywhere). So I guess we have a set of three...which stinks, because we need four. If they send a replacement for the bad one, I'll give them five stars. The lights are AWESOME. Very bright. Come on and go off like they should. They have even charged enough during rainy days to work for a few hours at night. I'd be extremely satisfied if there was a quick and easy way to request a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Ammons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these they are super cool, I've had them for a couple of years now and I couldn't be happier with them. Just remember to clean them off about every six months on the top so that you know they get good light. Will get a little dirty so every now and then like I would say three to six months just go outside wiping down with some Windex and you're good to go. They work great, got two sets of 4 in my backyard and they light up that yard amazingly. Would definitely recommend great value for your money. PS if they offer a warranty plan get the warranty plan as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Don't install permanently until at least a month -  if it failed, then it's easy to dump it into garbage bin!
customer_reviews.text: Works for 3 weeks then motion sensor just don't seem to work anymore regardless of waving, dancing or horseplaying. Texas sun and installed on the garage wall facing the south, so it got plenty of sun's exposure. Can't return it, however Amazon cust. rep give full refund, so instead of 1 star it got 2 stars. It looks good when it work so 1 star is for that. This would go to the garbage bin - such a waste. Really mad because now I have to go get the ladder and remove this from the brick wall - 7 feet high.Come to think that I had to drill the brick wall to install this even make me madder.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Super happy with it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I never write amazon reviews because I’m lazy and don’t really care. However, I love this product so much, it’s worth my time to tel you all how great it is. Installation? Easy. I literally put one nail in a fence and put this on it. Boom. Done. Liked it so much, bought a 2nd one. Used some rubber bands and twist ties to secure it to a metal fence in the back yard. Boom. Done. No batteries needed.. motion detection is on point. Brightness is great. Most importantly, raccoons have left my garden alone. Highly recommend this product if you want a solid light that’s easy to install anywhere, at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: David Steinfeld

customer_reviews.title: Good lights,  been using them for 2 years now.
customer_reviews.text: Ok y'all I want to give a review on these lights since using them for 2 years now. These are very nice and still work perfectly fine. Just remember with any solar light you have to keep it cleaned from tree sap or anything else that ends up on them. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good light. No I'm not getting paid for my review and I made the purchase . Have a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda J. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: These are terrific lights and really light things up
customer_reviews.text: I have installed these lights on the perimeter of my house. They work excellently! One of them is installed on the side of the house at the peak of the roof - and it senses movement very well! The others are sensing movement over 20' from the units. These are terrific lights and really light things up. I will be watching these lights and hoping the bright desert sun doesn't affect the lens that covers the sensors. Other lights I have purchased have failed within two years of use. I hope these last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Lewander

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor defective
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this above my garage door and have tested for the past few nights. The light is mounted in the center of the door/driveway. When I walk up the right side of the driveway in the dark, the sensor catches me about 20 feet away. When I walk up the left side of the driveway, the sensor does not see me until about 3 feet away Basically almost standing under it. The light is mounted flat and level. I have tested walking slow, fast, waving my arms, etc with consistent results. I am assuming that the sensor is defective. Bummer that I mounted with outdoor double sided tape and screw...
customer_reviews.author: CTCLUES

customer_reviews.title: decent lights
customer_reviews.text: The lights are decent. Not as bright as I anticipated, but good enough for what I was looking to get. One issue I had was the switch on one light does not stay in place. Its just keeps moving. Upon speaking to Amazon support they dont have many options. I would need to return BOTH lights to get a replacement. And the other light is installed and in a high area hard to get to. They cannot just swap one light. They claim the seller wont do anything, but Amazon never reached out to them. But I will keep the lights and tape the switch in place on the setting desired.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor seems to be hit or miss. Not ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The customer service for this is amazing. I didn't even ask for help with my light, they saw my review, and contacted me to let me know they're shipping out a replacement at no charge. Motion sensor seems to be hit or miss, not sure why. Not as bright as I was expecting, more LEDs does not mean brighter, just more light in more directions. I have another motion light which is brighter but very focused. I kinda like this one more as the light is more even. I think it's amazing that you can have a great motion light basically anywhere you want without running power to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a month
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on Nov. 22, 2016 and died on Dec. 13, 2016. Long time customer of amazon and normally do not write reviews. But, decided to pass this information along in case someone was purchasing this item as a security device. Not worth taking the time to return or replace.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light to illuminate the side of the house that does not get covered by the driveway light. There are no outlets there and it is very dark especially in winter. My wife walks through there when she has night shift or early morning. This light solves the problem, is very bright and requires no effort to install. It's been installed for a week now and gets enough charge even being overcast most the time. I just dug a hole with the post hole digger and stuck a treated 2x4 in there and put a screw in. I have set it to be off unless motion is detected.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: i received one that didn't work properly and they sent me a replacement so quickly no questions asked. By the way the new one is awesome works as expected. I put it on the corner of the garage because we have raccoons and me wife(not me... im super tough) is scared to walk passes when she gets home at night. Its lights up when you're with 15 feet id say and is really bright. Im probably going to order a few more for our path to the back. Thanks again for the great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We live out in the country where there are no street lights, no next door neighbors. These neat little lights really give you a big, bright bang for your buck. We love them. Got'em all round the yard and perimeter of the house, under our parking tent, at the door to the laundry house, the bird house, the storage shed, and the equipment building. The very best use we have found is to mount one on the exterior of the house right on top of our doggy door. Now, our 14 year old and half-blind Havanese can see clearly how to get back up the ramp and inside the house. The motion detection is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Maddox

customer_reviews.title: light worked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product for lighting on my back walkway and the motion detector and a solar light was a perfect solution. I received the light we had several days of rain and very cloudy so it seemed to take several days to get charged. It now is working great actually very bright on the highest setting lights up my entire small back yard as it is mounted on my deck one floor up from the basement entry. I planned to buy another if it worked and would buy it again but the single light covered the whole area. Very happy with the product at least for the first month I have had it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Lou skojec

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first one of these LED motion detector lights for the cabin to test it out there. It works great so we bought our second one which is also working great. On the occasions when the sun is not signing for days, which it sometimes does in the winter, the light does not get charged up enough. That is rare. Great choice if you don't want to change out all of your outdoor lights. And we live in Minnesota so winters can get cold. Still works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Ethen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 4 months ago and have been very satisfied with them! They are very easy to install and even easier to operate! I love the different feature options such as keeping them dim light or only activated with motion , they really are a great buy and when my neighbor saw them he decided to order some for his dock! Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ZoeyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: weirdly bright, but dim, no light depth penetration, just the immediate area
customer_reviews.text: The light is weird, i don't like it. The sensor works great tho! I have it mounted up on a tree in direct sunlight, all day. It's mainly used in an area so we can walk our dog at night. It's bright, but yet the brightness doesn't seem to translate into usable light or any sort of range penetration? I can't really explain it, and the pictures shown are NOT what i am getting out of it by FAR. The fixture itself is bright, but the surrounding light is sort of dim/muted. i am looking at other options and probably going to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Thrashie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.  Light has different settings which adapt well to seasonal sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: When it’s bright days for charging , it works great on the dim/bright/dim motion setting. With partially overcast days, it didn't charge enough to go from dim to bright light. The company responded to my review that complained about it, and they gave me instructions to change the setting option to off/bright/off. It works perfectly --- I didn't need the dim light all night anyway. Just needed to re-read the instructions! I was so grateful that the company wrote a thoughtful response of things to try -- customer service was superb
customer_reviews.author: Shrimper

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and great service
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights!! They are bright and pick up movement well. The only thing I would like changed is the duration of time they stay lit after motion has been detected. They stay on for 10-15 seconds before shutting off again where as I would prefer a solid minute of light, but of course that is more of a personal preference. Side note: one of the 4 lights malfunctioned and customer service was helpful and efficient in getting me a new light.
customer_reviews.author: A_N

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this light unless you are going to be using ...
customer_reviews.text: The light is smaller than I thought it would be for being a 24 LED light. Compared to an 8LED light that I use, the output seems to be weak(not as bright as the 8). The motion sensor doesn't work very well unless you are right next to it. I use it in the motion mode, haven't tried the other modes where it stays on all the time. It's a light. I can't use it where I intended to use it because of the motion sensor being weak. I would not recommend this light unless you are going to be using it in a small area and mounted low. Certainly not worth the $20 I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: HiFi

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: I would've rate this thing a 5 star, but the first one I received it didn't worked at all. I had to request for another one and send it back. For this, I rate it 4 star for not working in the place and inconvenience for me having to send it back and wait for the replacement to arrive. Other than that issue, it is super bright and can sense motions withing 8-10 feet away and lights up right away. It has setting to make the setting stay light 20 seconds or 30 seconds and adjust brightness. Overall, very satisfied with the order.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-Chang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brightness and motion detection
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these lights. I’ve had one by my front door for a year. Excellent lighting and motion detection. I use the setting for off until motion is detected, then full brightness. This light is located under an overhang by the front door. Despite the less than ideal position and the frequent cloudiness, this light always works. I’m not sure if it would if always on. That’s not how I want to use it. I just bought a second for behind the house. Recently adopted a dog and need more light for potty trips. Just as pleased with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expect more
customer_reviews.text: It is very simple, out of the box, screw included, all you need is a screw driver to install it. There are 3 options, and you have to choose the option before installation otherwise you have to remove it from the wall and move the switch on the back so test it first. I chose the 3rd option and was expecting a brighter light. I ended up purchasing an additional one to provide light more light down my alley way along side my house. It does do what is said it will do, I was just expecting a stronger luminescence from the LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: Global Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Easy peazy
customer_reviews.text: This light is pretty sweet. It was very easy to install. I picked the setting I wanted (#2) and mounted it on my back patio. It is working as advertised. So long as your area gets decent sun, the light should work throughout the night. The light is bright enough, just as I wanted. The motion detection is working nicely as well. For the price and ease of use, I highly recommend this light to anyone looking for an easy, wireless lighting solution.
customer_reviews.author: louconn

customer_reviews.title: Mine must be broken.
customer_reviews.text: Had this one for a bit now. And the always on but dim function doesn't work. I tried to even switch it and it just goes off. And now theres newer versions. Go figure. lol I don't want to go through any hassles sending it back. But when it does finally kick on it is nice and bright. And I also wish that you can have 2 screws on the top in the corners and maybe one at the bottom. Just for extra protection during bad weather. Mine kinda just swing freely. That's also how I was able to change the settings on the back of it. lol
customer_reviews.author: The Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bright with a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: The light is being used in our attached garage, which has no windows and so when you step into it, there is no light and it is dark. I bought this light so that I can solar recharge it and then bring it into the garage so that when we step into the garage, there is light. It works extremely well for this purpose. I also wanted to be able to use a recharger to charge the battery-in winter, when there is not much sunlight, etc. It was easy to unscrew the Phillips screws on the bottom of the charger and a snap to recharge the battery that way.
customer_reviews.author: aheyms

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Them
customer_reviews.text: We are renting a spare room in the back of our house with it's own private entrance so I decided that we would put one in perfect spots from the drive way to their door. When they park one comes on as you round the corner the garage one lights up everything in the back yard and within a few steps their entrance light goes on. They were perfect. My husband put one inside the small porch from the front door. He leaves when it's dark and instead of leaving the porch light on, this goes off in about 15 seconds or so.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Dittmer

customer_reviews.title: Spotlight the dog landmines
customer_reviews.text: I needed an item I could post by my dog's area outside without having to run wire to the center of my yard. Not just for the dogs but for humans to avoid the landmines... I was concerned about the brightness level as some solar products aren't very bright. This is immensely bright! I ha e it set to the third setting which only comes on, high brightness, triggered by motion. The second level stays on all the time at the minimum brightness unless triggered by motion, then the high brightness kicks on. Super cool, super compact, and happy with my purchase right out of the box. Will update as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars old version, 4 stars updated version
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, but the batteries do not stay charged after 6 months of use. Edit: 26Mar18- After a few months of using the newer/revised outdoor lights, they just seem to work better with the upgraded battery. I kind of miss the 4 way switch for adjustment. Maybe the lack of the cheap plastic switch has something to do with the better operation of this setup as well. Dunno Customer service on this product was spot on for the replacements. HOWEVER! Expect to be hounded twice a week to give a better than a 4 star review. The lights get a 4 star this time around because they are improved, but lose one star due to the constant email hounding.
customer_reviews.author: TedG

customer_reviews.title: Not much better than a small night light
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2 years after purchase. Bought 2 lights. One works sometimes and sometimes not. The other seems to work most nights but the light is not bright enough to be useful. 2 years and 3 months after purchase, company sent one single unit unsolicited by me. No notice, no explanation...just a package at the door. I'll find a use for it if it works better. Motion detection works sporatically. Brightness is not sufficient. Plastic base can easily break if getting screws a bit too tight.
customer_reviews.author: AM/FM

customer_reviews.title: bright light cheap mounting
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I received a new light from the seller which fixed the mounting issues and the light is still very bright at night. Again be sure to place it somewhere with no shade and lots of sun. The light is great, but it will easily brake off it's mounting because the top is just thin plastic. Also, if you do break it there is really no alternate way to mount this thing. The single hook at the top middle allows it to swing around that axis and allows for the light to become askew. Also, don't mount it anywhere without direct sun exposure, because it needs about eight hours of unblocked direct sunlight to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Frisco

customer_reviews.title: An unhappy Racoon
customer_reviews.text: If I was reviewing their customer service it would be a 5+.Bought 4 lights to increase lighting in my back yard to discourage critters from visiting the bird feeders. Initially all 4 worked well and than one went dark. There is an 18 month warranty on the lights and their customer service rep was awesome in resolving the dead light - assume the battery charging system went south. The lights work well and look great. Would NOT discourage anyone from buying these - they really want them to work and are there to support your purchase - so shop on!!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great light, limited life span
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to rate these. While they have great brightness and motion sensor detecting ability, the lights lasted between one year and 18 months. The light that gets the most sunshine lasted the longest and the shadiest lights the shortest. The lights don't stay on long in motion detector mode. Long enough for me, security and to get in and out of house (sometimes just wave hand if want it to come back on) but just FYI. I am trying a smaller similar light to see how they last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: great product overall
customer_reviews.text: we have been using the item for almost three months now. the product itself is nicely sized, not too big, about size of iphone 11 and easy to install. motion detection speed is bit slow and it doesn't light up right away. It is about few seconds off but it does light up when it detects the motion. Ours stopped working after 3 months so it is bit disappointing with the life span part so i guess you get what you pay for :( but it was okay when it worked! just wished their life time was longer. Having them on the outside did help us to have extra protections for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Andy D.

customer_reviews.title: Best light I've ever owned. Works flawlessly. Battery life unreal
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been on my garage for over a year and works perfectly. Amazingly I have NEVER changed the battery. Charges throughout the day and emits a low light at night until there is motion and then shines bright until the movement stops. Perfect and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: J&R

customer_reviews.title: This product surprise me with how bright it actually is
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This product really surprise me on the brightness and the throw of the light. I just picked up two and I put one at the beginning of my rant and the other one at the end of it and it lights up the entire ramp. I would like to purchase a couple more and will very soon to put around the front so that I can see when I get out of my car better at night. Great light it's well worth the money. Thank you so much for a beautiful product and for something I could trust. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Zambory

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting Option
customer_reviews.text: These lights are inexpensive and they work. They are very easy to install, with just a single screw. They are pretty good at motion detection and great for covering those darkly-lit corners of your house. I can't speak to the longevity, but having only had the light for a few months it still works well. It's good know if someone comes prowling around they won't have anywhere to hide. They are cheaper and easier to install than hard-wired motion lights and they work just as well, in my opinion. I'll probably buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bales

customer_reviews.title: Its a smallish-medium size unit and this was my 1st purchase for this item. Its a No Go for me!
customer_reviews.text: So I guess I shouldn't be too harsh on criticizing this product. I needed a Solar powered LED motion activated lights for my driveway and even though I had it in full daylight for 6 hrs in the Florida sunlight, when nighttime came and I hooked it up on the wall, I was disappointed in its brightness and the range. The product description says approx 20 ft but its actually 10ft. I then tried to return this item for a refund but Amazon didnt allow for a refund and after I spoke to the cust svc they advised me to verify that the seller allows for returns on all future items of this type before purchasing again! So be warned!
customer_reviews.author: I-Test-Everything

customer_reviews.title: Litom Solar Lights Super Bright 24 LED Outdoor Solar Motion Security Lighting With ...
customer_reviews.text: Litom Solar Lights Super Bright 24 LED Outdoor Solar Motion Security Lighting With LEDs on Both Side The lighting worked as advertised for about six weeks. The three options are a bit awkward to access, but seem to work fine. The device failed of course after the return deadline. UPDATE StarTOP - Amazon Marketplace contacted me after my review. They immediately sent a replacement. That is what I call proactive customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Rehsawg

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works, but mounting is below average.
customer_reviews.text: Day 2: motion detection works very well. Wide angle and reasonable distance. The light is very bright and also very wide angle. Everything is as advertised. I love the different modes. I have one to be on the dim unless motion detected right by the back porch and then the off unless motion detected by the gate. Very useful. Lost 2 stars because the mounting hardware and the mounting tab. Not a very solid mounting point. If there were another one at the bottom I'd feel better about it. Also the hardware is not appropriate for brick. We'll see how long it holds before I hang it another way.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Baik

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: 9/26/2020 update- one of 6 lights we have has ceased working after 1 year. We will replace with same light as these are quite convenient, although the lights yearly will get costly. We ordered these lights to use in the fenced in portion of our yard (about .25 acre). We originally ordered 4 to cover that area, but have since added one more. We've had them through summer, fall, winter, and going into spring. These lights were easy to install, the brightness level is great even after charging in weak winter sun, and we have a safer backyard for our dogs. We will buy more as needed for other areas.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear2020

customer_reviews.title: I’m back to buy more
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these two years ago and they’re still going strong. The motion detection is excellent, both hi & low levels are just how I’d like and what amazes me most is that in 2 years, there have only been a handful of times when they hadn’t gotten sufficient sun to “do their thing”. And they are NOT in what I’d consider a “full sun” location! My decorative pathway solar lights are a different story- argh! So, I’m going to stick with a winner and buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: W.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Solar Light
customer_reviews.text: I've now bought 6 of these outstanding lights for around my home out in the country. The motion detection is one of the best I've had (and I've bought several different manufactured products over the years!) along with the brightness. I put two of them off my bedroom deck and need to close my blinds due to the light. It seems I have several creatures that like to go after my bird feeders at night and when these light up, they book! Extremely happy with this product and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: After a run of attempted car thefts and break-ins around our neighborhood; we needed something to put up above the garage door with enough motion sensor to reach the end of the driveway. Not only does this do the job but the motion detection is radius is perfect for our short but wide driveway so it picks up anything if you even take one step off the sidewalk into our driveway. Safety and security this offers when we get home late at night is excellent. Ordering 2 more soon to install on the other side of our house that faces a cross street.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carter

customer_reviews.title: It really lights up!
customer_reviews.text: I've had different versions of these lights over the years, but these latest models with the "real" LEDs are much brighter. I like the options on this light also, that my others didn't have. For instance, you can have a constant on dim light, and then when something triggers the electric eye, the light comes on full brightness. OR, you can have NO light, until something triggers it.
customer_reviews.author: WV Radio Guy

customer_reviews.title: Too bright and too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: These are good solutions, easy to install (one screw) and they work well with the motion sensor. However, for my purposes, they are too bright, too cool and the motion sensor is so sensitive that the light comes on if a car drives by on the road, which is some 30-40 ft away, so they turn on unnecessarily often. Because they need to be exposed to sunlight, I have to mount them at about chest level around my house, but that makes them blindingly bright at night and the very cold color temperature doesn't help, these would be much more pleasant if they had warm white light.
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen LobertTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works just like they said.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an RV park and this light has been consistently working when I need it. Even when it's been raining and/or cloudy outside, it still absorbs enough energy to work every single night. I didn't want to affix it to my RV so i just put it on a table outside, aiming at my door and it lights my way in. I like the different settings on there as well. I have it set so that it's dim until someone/something walks into the pathway. On this setting, it uses up less of the energy and lasts all night long. I haven't tried the other settings yet. This one has been the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melani

customer_reviews.title: Good for a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: Quality seemed good and it worked well for about 10-15 days. Then some of the LEDs started dying out and dimming. The light faces south and has no obstructions either. Kind of a bummer but probably shouldn’t expect much out of a 16 dollar light. Amazon wants a tech expert to call me when I try to return it, but a tech expert is not needed. I just want to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden H

customer_reviews.title: Blinding
customer_reviews.text: This light is handy because its solar powered and i never have to recharge it and produces light when i need it to. although some cons i have to add is that while it is bright, it only seems too bright for my eyes and not necessarily for the area. the led lights are hard to look which may be a good or bad thing.? but the surrounding area still seems kind of dim. overall i think i should have went with a different design for what i needed it for, my porch
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Last all night
customer_reviews.text: So I have 3 of these now and I can tell you they do what is expected. Mine are set to run dim at sundown and go bright with motion. The motion detection works and when bright it's about as bright as a 15-watt lightbulb. When used in this setting and not tripping to bright frequently (in my backyard) the dim light lasts nearly all night in the early fall. Once winter sets in and the days get shorter we'll have to see if they get enough sunlight to perform as well.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and inexpensive. I put tow of these over my driveway and they work great. At night they have a dull glow until something crosses over the sensor and then they come to full brightness. I started with one and it did help but two made quite a difference. They mount with one screw and there is one toggle switch for selecting the sensitivity of the sensor. But, after those two steps and a full day of sun the units were good to go. Now my driveway has automatic lighting for very little money and install. They might not be the prettiest but they are great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Short life---updated
customer_reviews.text: These lights work great when they work. They are suppose to be waterproof but obviously they are not. The lights no longer work and I noticed there is condensation in the light area. I've only had them a few months and now I'm looking for replacements. Bummer... I'm updating my earlier review to 4 stars. The vendor reached out to me and made me whole again. They replaced the lights ant they are working great. I'm hoping these hold up but the fact that the vendor stands behind their products is very reassuring. I will definitely order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Nmaryland

customer_reviews.title: Very bad Motion-Detector range
customer_reviews.text: I live in Phoenix AZ and for 2 years I've had 4 of these mounted on the eve fascia facing east, south and west, 8 feet above ground. Battery is good and they recharge fine every day. The HUGE problem is that anyone can walk right under them and not be detected! What's the point if the light doesn't come on!?? I don't want to set them to be on all the time since I'll get a bunch of moths and mosquitoes being attracted (there are 3 settings, if I remember correctly it's Dim on and bright with detection, off and on with detection, and on all the time). Bad design and I do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great light for Summer; not that great for Fall
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for fall to review this product since I purchased it in the summer. The LITOM 24 LED Solar lights worked excellent for summer. It lit up my dog run very well. The motion sensor is flawless. It worked great through the windy summer nights and still had light in the early morning hours at 4:30 am. Fast forward; now it gets dark at 4:50 pm and I have to use a flashlight at 4:30 am in the morning since the solar motion light lost its light power. The four-hour difference between summer and fall are critical for the unit to work until the next morning which is why I give this product a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the front of my motorhome so when I have to walk around in the dark I have a nice light to brighten my way. This has worked perfectly the entire time I've been using it on a daily basis. Stays off when nothing is there but when needed it shines brightly. Only issue I have is that it's very sensitive and can go off even with the wind blowing in the trees. It took a few times to figure out what was going on. It's worth that little bit of hassle to have light when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Fuss

customer_reviews.title: Works great - bought a second
customer_reviews.text: This appears very simple and unassuming but it works wonderfully. I mounted this directly above my garage door to provide additional light at night for our security cams. There is a mode which allows it to stay in a dim setting until it picks up motion at which time it turn much brighter. The range is phenomenal. My driveway is 18’ long and this is mounted 11’ high. It picks up anyone walking on the sidewalk at the bottom of my driveway. This worked so well a neighbor was impressed and inquired about it so a I bought him one. Now, our eight closest neighbors have one mounted above their garage doors.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Guy

customer_reviews.title: Batteries do not last a full night, with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Batteries do not last a full night, with no motion triggers and strong sunlight during the daytime. I have other solar products - they last all night. Need to return these!
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Outside lights that can't get wet...
customer_reviews.text: You'd think since these are meant to go outside, that they would actually be at least water resistant. I had mine outside for 2 days, and after it rained, they didn't work right - randomly on and off, some dim, some bright. I inspected one that wasn't working, and there was water inside! Plus, when these do work and are bright, they are blinding to look at. they really need a better lens or diffuser or something...
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great Light......
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered this for my shed in AZ. Worked great for a month or so then just stopped working. Emailed the company for a replacement, did some trouble shooting and determined that the photo sensor wasn't working. The company was great and replaced it with NO issues in couple days. The New light is working great so A++++++ for great customer service and never speaking with a live person to correct my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bower
